content.text: Engineered to deliver consistent, reliable power that charges quickly while maintaining battery health

heading.subtitle: Alpha65 65W GaN Fast Charger
heading.title: Transform Your Charging Experience
heading.description: Alpha 65W GaN Fast Wall Charger, your one-stop solution for efficient and versatile charging. This product combines powerful GaN technology with a fun, transformable design, ideal for charging multiple devices at once.

features.title: 65 Watts Maximum Charging Output
features.description: Charge all your devices at futuristic speeds with 65 watts of USB power delivery. Replace all your old chargers with a single, high-efficiency Alpha65 fast charger that powers everything from laptops to smartphones and drones.

features.title: 3 USB Ports
features.description: With Alpha65's three USB ports, you can power through all your charging tasks at once. Two USB Type-C PD ports and one USB Type-A port deliver the fastest charge your devices can handle.

content.name: International Plugs
content.value: US, UK, and EU options included

content.text: Premium charging solution that's both powerful and portable

heading.subtitle: Alpha65 65W GaN Fast Charger
heading.title: Transform Your Charging Experience
heading.description: Alpha 65W GaN Fast Wall Charger, your one-stop solution for efficient and versatile charging. This product combines powerful GaN technology with a fun, transformable design, ideal for charging multiple devices at once.

features.title: GaN Fast Charging
features.description: High-efficiency gallium nitride transistors are smaller and faster than the silicon transistors used in other chargers. GaN construction keeps the Alpha65 cool at all times, even when it's carrying a full 65-watt power load.

features.title: Mecha Protection Mode: Enabled
features.description: Your Alpha65 wants to keep your devices safe! It features 8 different built-in protections against overvoltage, overcurrent, short-circuiting, overheating, overpower, low voltage, electrostatic discharge, and interference.

features.title: Futuristic Flexibility
features.description: The Alpha65 can recharge any device with a USB power supply, whether it has the latest fast charging tech or just basic USB power. It is compatible with 110V-240V input sources and is available with a US or EU/UK plug.

content.text: Combines durability, beauty and versatility for keyboard enthusiasts
More than a speaker - a work of art with premium audio quality

heading.subtitle: Mars Pro Bluetooth Speaker
heading.title: Sound Meets Sci-Fi
heading.description: The Mars Pro is more than just the perfect speaker for audiophilesâ€”its futuristic mecha design catches the eye while the speaker core impresses your ear. Three foldable legs lift the tough zinc alloy shell into the air for pristine sound without any distortion from surface contact.

features.title: 20 Watt Dual Speaker System
features.description: Twin speakers beat at the heart of the Mars Pro, pumping out 20 watts of powerful, richly textured sound that will fill any room and satisfy any listener.

features.title: Passive Bass Radiator
features.description: The Mars Pro speaker design includes a passive bass radiator to generate maximum bass from a small footprint, so your space stays clear and your lows stay loud.

features.title: Dynamic RGB Lighting
features.description: Match the vibe to your sonic style with the Mars Pro's customizable RGB lighting system. Choose one of six solid or pulsing colors for a consistent look, or switch things up with the dynamic music mode that shifts in time to the beat.

description.title: Special Mouse Pad for Mercury Gaming Mouse

content.text: The ideal surface for competitive gaming precision

content.name: Material
content.value: ABS base with PU leather surface

content.text: Reduces strain during extended typing or gaming sessions

heading.subtitle: Galaxy Keyboard Wrist Rest Pad
heading.title: Elevate Your Comfort, Enhance Your Flow
heading.description: The Galaxy Keyboard Wrist Rest Pad combines ergonomic support with luxurious comfort. Whether you're working or playing, this wrist rest ensures a natural hand position for effortless productivity.

features.title: Premium Build Quality
features.description: Constructed with a durable ABS plastic base and a PU leather surface, this wrist rest offers a perfect blend of sturdiness and comfort, ensuring long-lasting performance with a luxurious feel.

features.title: Ergonomic Support
features.description: Designed with ergonomics in mind, the wrist rest promotes natural wrist alignment, reducing strain during extended use. Its compact dimensions (32.5 x 72 mm) and lightweight design (153 g) make it an ideal accessory for both desktop and portable setups.

features.title: Stable and Stylish
features.description: The non-slip base guarantees stability, keeping the wrist rest securely in place on any surface. Its minimalist and elegant design adds a touch of sophistication to your workspace.
